author: PR.com
title: Event-Seekers International Will Host a Night to Salute and Celebrate Photographer Jim Alexander and to Launch The Jim Alexander Collection; Portraits, Commentary, Artist
text:
Event-Seekers International Will Host a Night to Salute and Celebrate Photographer Jim Alexander and to Launch The Jim Alexander Collection; Portraits, Commentary, Artist
Join Event-Seekers International in celebration of Jim Alexander: 80 years of life, 60 years of photography. It will be an evening of live music provided by the band, In The Mixx featuring Darryl Peek, purchase of Art, sumptuous appetizers and complimentary drinks by Pituad Cognac.
Atlanta, GA, October 21, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Over the course of 60 years in photography, Jim Alexander has amassed an amazing photography catalog, encompassing everything from visual artists, politicos, and music legends, to human rights events and activists. It is necessary for this body of work to be available for generations to come.
It is now time to create a permanent archive to preserve this valuable collection of American history. Join Event-Seekers International and Friends of JimM in celebration of Jim Alexander: 80 years of life, 60 years of photography. It will be an evening of live music provided by the band, In The Mixx featuring Darryl Peek, a Purchase Arena of Art, Sumptuous Appetizers and Complimentary Drinks by Pituad Cognac and Wines.
Experience: Portraits of History and Culture.
